forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West wind 16 to 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 14 to 23 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this morning, the air carries a subtle bite, crisp and invigorating under the expansive blue sky that promises a delightful day ahead. While the temperature hovers around the cool side of the spectrum, the forecast hints at a high reaching nearly 60 degrees, which will gently descend as the afternoon sweeps in. A notable westerly wind dances through the streets, rustling the leaves and nudging passersby toward a lighter jacket or a cozy wrap. 

As the day progresses, one might observe the golden warmth of sunlight spilling its embrace across the city, offering a beautiful contrast to the fleeting wisps of morning fog that linger in the nooks of the bay. The weather, though predominantly sunny, invites ambivalence—partly cloudy skies will accompany the nightfall, revealing a delicate interplay of shadows and light. For those headed out, consider donning layers to navigate the dynamic temperatures, a thin sweater or light jacket perfect for an evening stroll along the waterfront. Engage in the everyday pleasures of the city: a leisurely walk through the Mission District, perhaps with a stop at one of the local taquerias, or an art walk to appreciate the vibrant murals that lend character to the streets. A day of simple adventures awaits, wrapped in the welcoming embrace of a quintessential San Francisco day.
